coref: A Bear roaming the woods in search of berries happened on a fallen tree in which a swarm of Bees had stored a swarm of Bees honey. A Bear roaming the woods in search of berries Bear began to nose around the log very carefully to find out if the Bees were at home. Just then one of a swarm of Bees came home from the clover field with a load of sweets. Guessing what A Bear roaming the woods in search of berries was after, the Bee flew at the Bee, stung the Bee sharply and then disappeared into the log. A Bear roaming the woods in search of berries A Bear roaming the woods in search of berries lost the Bee temper in an instant, and sprang upon the log tooth and claw, to destroy the nest. But this only brought out a swarm of Bees. A Bear roaming the woods in search of berries A Bear roaming the woods in search of berries had to take to A Bear roaming the woods in search of berries heels, and A Bear roaming the woods in search of berries was able to save A Bear roaming the woods in search of berries only by diving into a pool of water.
